  <title>Easements</title>
  <abstract>Easements on state land give the grantee partial interest, but not ownership, in the land as authorized under Chapter 3 of the Board of Land Commissioners' Rules and Regulations. Easements may include ditches, overhead wires, pipelines, railroads, reservoirs, public roads and highways, roadways to private land or residences, snow fences, underground cables, open spaces, and any other appropriate uses.</abstract>
